content: Input on thread in manager discussion))) https://scratch.mit.edu/studios/5842709/comments/#comments-180364717 I don’t think we should allow the project to be added. The creator has said some homophobic/transphobic things, and supports the bill. While the project is unbiased, there are plenty of other projects about the bill farther down that people can look at. The project won’t add anything new to the studio, but it will provide a link to a person with homophobia in their comment section.
